content: Lin Gao Lin Gao I am professor (PhD supervisor) with University of Chinese Academy of Sciences. I received my PhD degree from Tsinghua University in 2014 under guidance of Prof. Shi-Min Hu. I was a visiting professor in Prof. Leif Kobbelt group in RWTH Aachen University at 2016.
